"Solid company and an amazing group of people that work there." "Family owned, excellent customer communication!" "Hands down the best experience we’ve had with a home remodeling contractor."

Reformed Outdoor Structures (ROS) saved our deck. Another contractor started a new deck build for us a year ago and quit before finishing. We found out after that the original contractor under-built the framing and the construction was so … More

This is the second time we’ve worked with the team at ROS, and they continue to be the most professional, thoughtful, and efficient contractors we’ve ever hired. … More Response from the owner 6 months ago We truly appreciate your thoughtful review, Augie! It was a pleasure working with you. Lord willing, we look forward to future projects together. -The ROS Team

Reformed Outdoor Structures was referred to us by friends - and we were not disappointed. This team was creative, communicative and stuck to their word. They were willing to work within our goals/budgets and deliver an end product that we will enjoy for years to come. I'd turn to them again in a heartbeat! Response from the owner 6 months ago Your satisfaction is our aim, and we are so glad we hit that target! Thank you, Ryan! -The ROS Team Pergola, Patio Covers, Deck Builders at RHH Constructio
